title: (x) mig - Trebuchet {Chesh}
content:
Hi all, can someone please help me identify this font. Sorry I only have three characters - but the 'g' should hopefully trigger something. I appreciate this guys. ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071118040631im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/28644.gif)

 [‹ (x) NYC Subway font - Helvetica {Karl}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071118040631/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3610 "Go to previous forum topic") ["Hollis Kennels" hand written font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071118040631/http:/www.typophile.com/node/3588 "Go to next forum topic")
author: typofella22

comments.content: thanks Joseph! Sometimes, you look everywhere, books and all, foundry books - then someone tells you it's a microsoft free font! \*ding\* - not: more like Doh! Thanks again Joseph!
Also BIG thanks goes to Dave!!
